job.title: Data Analyst II
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: strongSummarybrbrstrongThe Data Analyst 2 position is responsible for advancing our data environment via creating and maintaining database objects data models and enduser reports with an emphasis on helping to advance the selfservice reporting environment The position can also be responsible for investigating business processes to determine how to best answer questions given  as well as suggest questions that may not have been initially asked At times the position will include investigative efforts which require reaching out to various other members of the organizationbrbrstrongJob Dutiesbrstrongulli Build develop and maintain data models reporting systems dashboards and performance metrics that support key business decisions lili Organize and drive ones analytical insight initiatives from conception to completion being cognizant of status and roadblocks and escalating as necessary to ensure success and ontime delivery lili Answer more challenging data inquiries lili Help refine data standards lili Act as a mentor to entrylevel Data Analysts lili Other projects or duties as assigned brliulstrongRequirementsbrstrongulli College education or equivalent experience required Higher education in analysis business statistics computer science data or equivalent experience preferred lili Three years in Data Analytics or a highly related field lili Excel skills to a moderately advanced level lili SQL any flavor querying experience to an advanced level lili SQL any flavor experience creating modifying and managing database objects lili Power BI experience to a moderately advanced level or advanced experience with a different BI tool lili Knowledge of and ability to apply dimensional modeling lili Experience with Microsoft Azure is not at all a requirement  but a plus brliulstrongGeneral Knowledge amp Skillsbrstrongulli Flexibility  the position is with a fast growing company which can create many opportunities but also means processes goals etc can often change lili Strong problem solving quantitative and analytical abilities brliulstrongAbout The CompanybrbrstrongFLEETCOR Technologies Inc FLEETCOR is a leading global provider of business payment solutions We help companies of all sizes control simplify and secure payment of various domestic and crossborder payables using specialized payment products We serve businesses partners merchants consumers and payment networks in North America Latin America Europe and Asia Pacificbrulli 26B Annual Revenue lili 100 Countries lili 20B Transactions per Year lili 8500 Employees brliulem as of December 31 2019brbremOur payment solutions provide our customers with a payment method designed to be superior to and more robust and effective than what they use currently whether they use a competitors product or another alternative method such as cash or check We group our payment solutions into five primary categories Fuel Lodging Tolls Corporate Payments and Gift Each category is unique in its focus customer base and target markets but they also share a number of characteristics customers are primarily businesses have recurring revenue models have specialized networks which create barriers to entry have high margins and have similar selling systemsbrbrstrongFLEETCOR Enjoys Global Recognition Includingbrstrongulli Forbes Global Growth Champion  FLEETCOR is one of the 250 fastest growing companies in the world as determined by Forbes and Statista lili Forbes Worlds Most Innovative Companies  FLEETCOR has made this prestigious list of leading innovative companies 4 years in a row lili Fortune 1000 Company  FLEETCOR was one of the largest movers in the new rankings of the largest companies in America ranking872 lili SampP 500  In 2018 FLEETCOR joined the SampP stock index comprised of the 500 leading US stocks based on market cap company value brliulstrong Our VisionbrbrstrongDespite many advances in our industry the majority of business payments are still made with outdated and inferior payment methods such as checks and cash We envision a business world where every purchase is controlled every payment is digital and every paymentrelated decision is wellinformed In this future paperless state payments will require little to no time to manage leaving companies with more time for what matters most activities that grow their businessesbrbrstrong Our MissionbrbrstrongFLEETCORs mission is to provide businesses with a better way to pay by replacing outdated payment methods such as checks and cash and displacing the incumbent providers of those methods Through the digitalization of payments we create and support robust ecosystems which benefit all participating constituents paymentmaking customers paymentaccepting merchants taxcollecting governments and FLEETCORbrbrstrongOur StrategybrbrstrongFLEETCOR is a growth company and we employ a simple threeprong strategy for growing our businessbrulli More Customers We invest more than 200 million per year in sales and marketing predominately focused on new customer acquisition We continue to scale existing sales channels and headcount enable our sales people with demand generation and other tools and launch new distribution channels both internally and through partners such as ERP software providers telematics companies and banks We will also grow our customer base inorganically through acquisitions lili More Spend We seek to leverage our existing customer relationships and capture greater share of their business payment expenditures As such we have developed various beyond initiatives where we extend the utility of an existing payment product without degrading the core value proposition of the original product As such a customer can buy more stuff without sacrificing the controls and reporting which attracted the customer to our product to begin with For example lili Our Fuel card customers can enable their cards to allow nonfuel purchases relevant to their business like allowing a painting crew to buy supplies at a home improvement store so they can finish the paint job lili Our Toll tag customers can use their invehicle RFID tags to make other on the go purchases like parking fuel and fastfood liul For our customers these product extensions reduce payment friction saving them time and operational headaches For FLEETCOR these product extensions can increase our share of wallet with existing customers and can increase our products appeal and applicability to previouslyunserved customer segments eg nontoll urban dwellers We also create new product offerings developed internally or in conjunction with partners to crosssell to our existing customer basebrulli More Geographies We continue to seek attractive entry opportunities in major international markets which we intend to pursue through acquisitions and partnerships brliulstrong Our Commitment to Diversity Equality Inclusion Belonging brbrstrongstrongWe Are Therefore Committed To Building And Nurturing a Culture Of Diversity Inclusion And Belonging BybrbrstrongTogether we can
